attributes.action: stop the privatisation of the british companies and establishments that are an integral part of our great institution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Governments have repeatedly sold off and privatised many sections of what was the great british system in order to get a quick cash injection into the governments coffers without thinking of the long term effects on users of these industries and the staff required to run them. If they were to try to help these indusrties rather than systematically run them into the ground or desert them and leave them to fend for themselves until they can say 'this industry isn't working, lets sell it!' maybe we could put the 'Great' back into 'Great Britain' and have a set of state companies we could once again be proud of.
